title: Cyclops
description: 20’ tall humanoids with a single, central eye. Dwell in caves, alone or in small groups. Cultivate grapes and raise sheep.
extras: Attack penalty: –2 penalty on all hit rolls, due to limited depth perception.	Rock throwing: Up to 200’.	Slow-witted: Can be tricked by clever PCs.	Curse: 1-in-20 cyclops can place a curse on a character once a week. Save versus spells or be afflicted by a curse of the referee’s choosing. (Maximum possible effects: –2 penalty to saves, –4 penalty to hit, an ability score reduced by 50%.)
